mapper.select: select book.isbn, book.book_title, book.writer_name, book.translator_name, book.publisher_name, book.book_tot_page, book.book_published_date, book.book_price, book.book_price_for_sale, book.book_stock, book.book_story, book.book_img, authors.author, translators.translator from book, authors, translators where book.isbn = authors.isbn and book.isbn = translators.isbn order by book.book_title

select book.isbn, book.book_title, book.writer_name, book.translator_name, book.publisher_name, book.book_tot_page, book.book_published_date, book.book_price, book.book_price_for_sale, book.book_stock, book.book_story, book.book_img, authors.author, translators.translator from book, authors, translators where book.isbn = authors.isbn and book.isbn = translators.isbn order by book.book_price_for_sale

select bk.isbn, bk.book_title, bk.writer_name, bk.translator_name, bk.publisher_name, bk.book_tot_page, bk.book_published_date, bk.book_price, bk.book_price_for_sale, bk.book_stock, bk.book_story, bk.book_img, au.author, tr.translator from book bk, authors au, translators tr where bk.isbn = au.isbn and bk.isbn = tr.isbn and bk.isbn = #{isbn}

select * from (select bk.isbn, bk.book_title, bk.writer_name, bk.translator_name, bk.publisher_name, bk.book_tot_page, bk.book_published_date, bk.book_price, bk.book_price_for_sale, bk.book_stock, bk.book_story, bk.book_img, au.author, tr.translator from book bk, authors au, translators tr where bk.isbn = au.isbn and bk.isbn = tr.isbn order by bk.isbn) where author = #{author} and rownum <= 6
